title: Bai Yu Gushi
synopsis: People in the world often drink the water of wealth, color, famous food, sleep, and five desires, and sometimes feel tired, hoping that the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind should be cleaned without disturbing each other. From the heart, use time to prevent one's own mind from climbing up and not having delusions. If you don't keep away from doing kung fu from the heart in this way, and only require that the realm of the five desires not be invaded, it is impossible to prevent the appearance of sensuality, etc., and it is impossible to get rid of the troubles. This is futile. (translated from iqiyi)
